text.text: This is a crumpled old advertisement for a local pizzaria.  It depicts smiling kids and some sort of animal mascot.  The flier reads "Eat, rock, party, play."

text.//: Reference to 11 Drunk Guys Play FNAF.
text.text: This is a crumpled old advertisement for a local pizzaria.  It depicts smiling kids and some sort of animal mascot.  The flier reads "Eat, rock, party, play!"  Someone has crudely scrawled underneath it "Smoke weed every day!"
"This is a kids place, why is their mascot so stacked!?"
"NO BAD ROBOT I DON'T WANT PIZZA."
"Fuckin haunted pizza joint, just burn it down"
"Pizza, arcade tokens, horrible death, got my bases covered."
"leg eaten by zombie robot furry help"
